##Problem 1

First loading all necessary packages

```{r loading necessary packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)

```

Using list.files function to list all of the file names within the data folder.

```{r using list.files func}

folder = "./data"

folder_files = list.files(folder)

treat_id = 
  sapply(strsplit(folder_files, split = ".", fixed = TRUE), function(x) (x[1]))

file_names = tibble(
  treatment_id = treat_id
)
```

```{r parsing file_names column}



```


```{r}
file_name = function(x) {
  names = list.files(path = "./data")

  tibble(
    names = names
  )
}


```
